title: Entitled homeowner uses resident's parking space, claiming she can because they are just renters: 'Well, now I am the president of the HOA!'
description: This former renter-turned-homeowner showed his entitled neighbor exactly who she was dealing with…Let this story serve as a potent reminder that sometimes the most uncalled-for comments can become fuel for your eventual triumph. For this renter, he and his wife were treated poorly by the lady next door, who thought she could get away with using one of their designated parking spaces simply because she was a homeowner and they weren't. Well, that all changed when they decided to buy their place. On top of that, the former renter opted to run for president of their HOA after the former president stepped down following two decades in the position. Now, he's president of the HOA, and the entitled neighbor has to show him some respect every time they run into each other. As the author himself stated, we're certain that his ascendency lives "rent-free" in her mind! Keep scrolling below for the full story…
